resources.string: No application can handle this request. Please install a web browser.
Tap to purchase, or to refresh if you\'ve purchased already.
Tap to purchase (%s), or to refresh if you\'ve purchased already.
Only record minimal analytics. These are anonymous.
Allow additional analytics to be recorded. These are intended to be anonymous (see the Cookie Policy).
Showing non-personalized ads. This will not reduce the amount of ads shown compared to personalized ads.
Showing personalized ads. This requires transmitting a device identifier to our Third Party ad provider.
Tap here to see our Cookie policy
Tap here to see our Privacy policy
Open links within the app where possible
Always open links externally in the default browser
Clear all data for this app
Clear all data for this app?

This cannot be undone.

This will clear all preferences for this app, and any other data associated with this app (if applicable). It will also log this app out of any accounts (if applicable). It will not affect any other apps or accounts on the device. It will also close the app, if you still want to use it you will need to open it and set it up again.
I understand that this will clear data for this app and cannot be undone.

Your data privacy is important.

In order to support development and improve our apps, we use ads and cookies.

You can see our Cookie Policy and Privacy Policy for more details on what information is collected and how it\'s used.

Select \'OK\' to allow cookies and personalized ads or \'Manage Changes\' to adjust settings.

To improve our services we use cookies and similar technologies.

In order to provide basic functionality, we need to store and transmit a minimum amount of data.

But you can control whether additional analytics are collected, and you can choose whether to show personalized ads, or ads which will be less relevant to you. Alternatively, you can upgrade to remove all ads.

You can view our Cookie Policy and Privacy Policy for more details.
You have already purchased an upgrade, so no ads will be shown.

Version %1$s (%3$d)

Copyright \u00A9 %5$d–%6$d R J Hart Software Limited.

See %4$s for libraries used by %2$s

Let us know if you would like to improve the translation in your language, or help translate the app into your language.

By submitting your email address, you agree to us saving your email address securely and contacting you directly using that email address. This will not sign you up to any regular mailing lists, and we will not pass your email address on to any Third Party.
